original_text: And it came to pass, that when Jeremiah had made an end of speaking unto all the people all the words of the Lord their God, for which the Lord their God had sent him to them, even all these words,
korean_text: 예레미야가 모든 백성에게 그들의 하나님 여호와의 말씀 곧 그들의 하나님 여호와께서 자기를 보내사 그들에게 이르신 이 모든 말씀을 말하기를 마치니

sentences.original_text: that when Jeremiah had made an end of speaking
all the words of the Lord their God
for which the Lord their God had sent him to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 하나님 여호와께서 그들을 위해 그를 보내신 것은
